properties.name: doky.filestorage.type
properties.description: Defines storage type for files in Documents.

properties.name: doky.filestorage.path
properties.description: Path where files should be saved. It is used both for local filesystem storage and Azure Blob.

properties.name: doky.filestorage.azure.connection
properties.description: Connection string for Azure Blob.

properties.name: doky.filestorage.azure.container
properties.description: Name of container in Azure Blob to store files.

properties.name: doky.password.reset.token.duration
properties.description: Defines in minutes how long token for reset password is valid.

properties.name: doky.email.server.type
properties.description: Defines type of integration to send emails.

properties.name: doky.app.host
properties.description: The host used for links in emails. Usually it points to frontend host.

properties.name: doky.email.sender.email
properties.description: Define email used as sender.

properties.name: doky.email.sender.name
properties.description: Defines name for sender.

properties.name: doky.email.templates.path
properties.description: Path to velocity templates for emails.

properties.name: doky.email.sendgrid.api-key
properties.description: API key for sendgrid integration.

properties.name: doky.email.registration.sendgrid.template-id
properties.description: Sendgrid template for registration email (welcome email).

properties.name: doky.email.registration.subject
properties.description: Subject for registration email.

properties.name: doky.email.reset-password.sendgrid.template-id
properties.description: Sendgrid template is for reset password email.

properties.name: doky.email.reset-password.subject
properties.description: Subject for reset password email.

properties.name: doky.kafka.username
properties.description: Username for kafka server.

properties.name: doky.kafka.password
properties.description: Password for kafka server.

properties.name: doky.kafka.emails.topic
properties.description: Kafka topic name for emails.

properties.name: doky.kafka.emails.group.id
properties.description: Kafka group id for emails topic.

properties.name: doky.kafka.emails.consumer.id
properties.description: Kafka consumer id for emails topic.

properties.name: doky.kafka.emails.consumer.autostart
properties.description: Defines if kafka consumer for emails should be started automatically.

properties.name: doky.kafka.emails.concurrency
properties.description: Defines kafka consumer concurrency for emails topic.

properties.name: scheduler.documents.index.full
properties.description: Defines cron expression for schedule full index for Documents.

properties.name: doky.email.test.prefix
properties.description: The prefix of email used for e2e tests.

properties.name: doky.email.test.send
properties.description: Specifies if emails should be sent during e2e tests.

properties.name: doky.kafka.documents.topic
properties.description: Kafka topic name for documents indexing.

properties.name: doky.kafka.documents.group.id
properties.description: Kafka group id for documents indexing topic.

properties.name: doky.kafka.documents.consumer.id
properties.description: Kafka consumer id for documents indexing topic.

properties.name: doky.kafka.documents.consumer.autostart
properties.description: Specifies if consumer should start automatically on application startup.

properties.name: doky.kafka.documents.concurrency
properties.description: Defines Kafka consumer concurrency for document indexing topic.

values.description: Use local filesystem to save files attached to Document.
Use Azure Blob Storage to save files attached to Document.
Use SMTP configuration to send emails. In this case SMTP properties should be defined, velocity templates from codebase are used.
Use Sendgrid API integration to send emails. In this case sendgrid API configs should be defined, sendgrid templates are used.
